title: Linnea Lundquist
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Linnea Lundquist**

Founding partner of [TypoBrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/TypoBrand), Linnea is an expert in font production and worked for twelve years at [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe). During that period she worked on [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Optima), [Sabon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sabon), [Adobe Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe%20Caslon), [Chaparral](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chaparral), [Tekton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tekton), and others.

Linnea runs [Atelier Gargoyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Atelier%20Gargoyle) with partner [Ward Dunham](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ward%20Dunham).

[Bio at TypoBrand.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809061217/http:/www.typobrand.com/experience/lundquist.html)
author: Jared Benson
